    'allowLinker': true
  });

  ga('require', 'linker');

  function trackOutboundLink(url) {
    ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {hitCallback: function () {
      window.location.href = url;
    }});
  }

        </span>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-twitter" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness" data-track-share="twitter" href="https://twitter.com/share?url=http%3A%2F%2Faplus.com%2Fa%2Fspread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness&amp;text=Hungry%20Man%20Goes%20Asking%20For%20Food%20And%20Gets%20Nothing%2C%20But%20What%20Happens%20Next%20Will%20Bring%20You%20To%20Tears%20via%20%40aplusapp" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 800, 400);return false;" target="_blank">
        <i class="fa fa-twitter">
        </i>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-pinterest" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness" data-share-media="//ap_images.s3.amazonaws.com/photo_for_facebooks/000/001/299/2c653937-9e5e-4fd2-b144-a2b92e2e2fb5_main.jpg" data-track-share="pinterest" href="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness&amp;description=Hungry%20Man%20Goes%20Asking%20For%20Food%20And%20Gets%20Nothing%2C%20But%20What%20Happens%20Next%20Will%20Bring%20You%20To%20Tears" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 800, 400);return false;" target="_blank">
        <i class="fa fa-pinterest">
        </i>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-gplus" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness" data-track-share="gplus" href="https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 600, 600);return false;" target="_blank">
        <i class="fa fa-google-plus">
        </i>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-email" href="mailto:?subject=Hey%2C%20I%20saw%20this%20on%20A%2B%20and%20thought%20of%20you&amp;body=http%3A%2F%2Faplus.com%2Fa%2Fspread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness" ng-click="trackEmailArticleShare(article.id)" target="_blank">
        <i class="fa fa-envelope">
        </i>
       </a>

       <a class="btn btn-transparent-white next-page-btn no-radius" href="http://aplus.com/a/anon/bill-clinton-asked-by-jimmy-kimmel-whether-aliens-exist-his-answer-is-causing-a-stir">

   <div class="container">
    <div class="leaderboard-ad-area">
     <div class="google-ad-tag-container " id="div-gpt-ad-1403298890989-2">
      <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
       //&lt;![CDATA[

   <div class="content-container">
    <div id="div-gpt-ad-1435869289965-0">
     <script type="text/javascript">
      googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1435869289965-0'); });
     </script>
    </div>
    <script>
     window.NEXT_ARTICLE_URL = 'http://aplus.com/a/anon/bill-clinton-asked-by-jimmy-kimmel-whether-aliens-exist-his-answer-is-causing-a-stir';
    </script>
    <div class="container">
     <div class="article-header">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-sm-10">
        <h1 class="article-headline" itemprop="headline">
         Hungry Man Goes Asking For Food And Gets Nothing, But What Happens Next Will Bring You To Tears
        </h1>
        <p class="preview-text">
         Sometimes those who have less, give more.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row">
      <div class="gcs_inactive_wrapper" style="">
       <div class="col-sm-2 col-lg-2 article-byline-col">
        <div class="article-byline-comments">
         <div class="row">
          <div class="article-byline">
           <div class="author-photo">
            <span class="author-image" style="background-image:url(//images5.aplus.com/uc-up/427615a3-d5f8-4dfc-8ee6-ad39d664075e/bakutytefoto.format_jpeg.jpg);">
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="author-info">
            <span class="author">
             <a class="name" href="/u/justina" rel="author">
              Justina Bakutyte
             </a>
            </span>
            <span class="author-social">
             <i class="fa fa-twitter">
             </i>
             <a class="author-social-sn" href="https://twitter.com/justinabaku" target="_blank">
              @justinabaku
             </a>
            </span>
            <time class="timestamp" content="2014-08-24T14:30:00-07:00" datetime="24 Aug 14:30" itemprop="datePublished">
             Aug 24, 2014
            </time>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="comments-count">
           <div class="comments-count">
            <i class="fa fa-comment">
            </i>
            <span class="count">
             <fb:comments-count href="https://aplus.com/a/spread-the-message-homeless-act-of-kindness">
             </fb:comments-count>
            </span>
            <span class="hidden-xs">
             comments
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="article-category-container">
           <span class="article-category-name" itemprop="about">
            <div itemscope="" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb" style="display:inline;" title="change">
             <a class="category-Change" href="/c/change" itemprop="url">
              <span itemprop="title">
               change
              </span>
             </a>
            </div>
           </span>
           <span class="article-category-description">
            stay informed and spark change on social issues
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article-ad-byline-logo">
         <div class="article-byline-logo" id="div-gpt-ad-1433433838832-0" tag_class="article-byline-logo">
          <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
window.rtp_queue.push(['display', 'div-gpt-ad-1433433838832-0']);
//]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-sm-7 col-lg-7 article-content-col">
        <div class="article-photo">
         <img alt="Hungry Man Goes Asking For Food And Gets Nothing, But What Happens Next Will Bring You To Tears" class="article-image" src="//ap_images.s3.amazonaws.com/photo_for_facebooks/000/001/299/2c653937-9e5e-4fd2-b144-a2b92e2e2fb5_original.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <div class="article-content desktop-article freeform" itemprop="articleBody">
         <div class="legacy-html">
          <p>
           On the surface, especially on the heels of the Ice Bucket Challenge, people are inclined to help others. However, that's not always the case.
          </p>
          <p>
           A bunch of young adults faced this cold-hearted truth in a social experiment of their own. An initiative group called
           <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/Spread-the-message/343235499158496?sk=timeline">
            Spread the Message
           </a>
           filmed a shockingly revealing video which shows the decaying sides of our humanity.
          </p>
          <h2>
           3 minutes that will change the way you think:
          </h2>
          <div id="fb-root">
          </div>
          <script>
           (function(d, s, id) { var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; if (d.getElementById(id)) return; js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id; js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1"; fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs); }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
          </script>
          <div class="fb-post" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=343240352491344" data-width="466">
           <div class="fb-xfbml-parse-ignore">
            <a href="https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=343240352491344">
             Post
            </a>
            by
            <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/Spread-the-message/343235499158496">
             Spread the message
            </a>
            .
           </div>
          </div>
          <h2>
          </h2>
          <p>
           According to their statement, Spread the Message in on a mission to change the way people think, act, and treat others. They've currently set up a
           <a href="http://www.gofundme.com/spreadthemessage">
            funding option
           </a>
           and are planning to use the donations for making films that would create a chain reaction of positivity. With this video, they have already taken the first step.
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            <i>
             Liked this article? Click the share buttons below!
            </i>
           </b>
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article-bottom-section">

           <script>
            window._tbtags = window._tbtags || [];

    mode: "thumbnails-c",

    placement: "Below Article 1 Thumbnails",
    target_type: 'mix'
  });
           </script>
          </div>
         </div>
         <script>
          ;(function (w, d) {
  
    function _renderAbl(abId) {
      var html = '&lt;div id="adblade-container" class="';
      html += (__.isMobileDevice() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop' ) + '"&gt;';
      html += '&lt;ins class="adbladeads" data-cid="'+ abId + '"';
      html += ' data-host="web.adblade.com" data-tag-type="2"'
      html += ' style="display:none"&gt;&lt;/ins&gt;';
      html += '&lt;/div&gt;';
      return html;
    }
  
    var isMobile = __.isMobileDevice(),
        ccM = d.getElementsByClassName('mobile-latest-container'),
        ccD = d.getElementsByClassName('article-recommended'),
        audiences = __.getAudiences(),
        kx = '\u006C\u0069\u006C\u0077\u0061\u0079\u006E\u0065';
  
  
    if (isMobile) {
      __.rr.yieldmo();
    } else if (audiences.length &gt; 0) {
      __.rr.lockerdome();
    }
  
    function _renderLW() {
      if (isMobile) {
        var container = ccM[0];
        container.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', _renderAbl("12148-3773095598"));
        __.rr.adblade();
      } else {
        var container = ccD[0];
        container.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', _renderAbl("12147-1103762154"));
        __.rr.adblade();
      }
    }
  
    if (isMobile &amp;&amp; audiences.length) {
      __.rr.gumgum();
    }
  
    if (audiences.indexOf(kx) !== -1 || audiences.indexOf('111') !== -1) {
      _renderLW();
    } else if (!__.isSlideshow()) {
      var con = (isMobile ? ccM : ccD)[0];
      __.rr.taboola();
    }
  
  }(window, document));
         </script>

             <a class="photo" href="http://aplus.com/a/a-place-at-the-table-united-states-hunger-a">

        <div class="aplus-name">
         <h1>
          A Plus
         </h1>
         <small>
          Positive Journalism
         </small>
        </div>
       </a>
       <div class="footer-aplus-mission">
        <p>
         A Plus is a digital media company co-founded by Ashton Kutcher that features stories that make a difference and create positive change. Were built from the ground up for the social age. In less than a year weve reached an audience of approximately 50 million monthly visitors by highlighting social issues, sharing breaking news, and creating original, entertaining content.
        </p>

  var d = new Image(1, 1);

  d.onerror = d.onload = null;
  };

   </div>

  <!-- Facebook JS -->
  <script>
   FACEBOOK_APP_ID = '538951249478848';
  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    // init the FB JS SDK
    FB.init({
    appId      : FACEBOOK_APP_ID,
    status     : true, // check the login status upon init?
    cookie     : true, // set sessions cookies to allow your server to access the session?
    xfbml      : true,  // parse XFBML tags on this page?
    frictionlessRequests : true
    });

    var cev = (window.initCustomEvent != null) ? window.initCustomEvent : function (name) {
      return new CustomEvent(name, {bubbles: true});
    };
    window.document.dispatchEvent(cev('fbinit', true, false))
  };

  (function(d, s, id){
  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
  if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
  </script>
  <script>
   !function(d,s,id){var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],p=/^http:/.test(d.location)?'http':'https';if(!d.getElementById(id)){js=d.createElement(s);js.id=id;js.src=p+'://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';js.async='true';fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);}}(document, 'script', 'twitter-wjs');
  </script>
  <script src="http://cdn5.aplus.com/assets/desktop_static-19903ccdd8b36313cff2d1ee08cee619.js">
  </script>
  <script src="http://cdn5.aplus.com/assets/testing-be71c6313c94cc981d7c9dd713097917.js">
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window._apa = window._apa || [];
  </script>
  <script async="true" defer="true" src="//images5.aplus.com/js/apa.js?v=1.91">
  </script>
  <script src="http://cdn5.aplus.com/assets/tracking-1fcb4e8ef206c5bc4f2670076f0c469c.js">
  </script>
  <!-- inlined to provide experiments that require jQuery; to use experiments that work before jQuery load -->
  <!-- see `_experiments.html.haml` -->
  <script>
   (function() {
    var pageVariations, _noop;
  
    console.log('slider initializing experiemnt');
  
    _noop = (function() {});
  
    pageVariations = [function() {}, function() {}];
  
    (pageVariations[window.chosenVariation] || _noop)();
  
  }).call(this);
  </script>
  <noscript>
   <div style="display:none;">
    <img alt="quantcast" border="0" height="1" src="//pixel.quantserve.com/pixel/p-H0QK8sm23uH-P.gif" width="1"/>
   </div>
  </noscript>

</html>
